EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Sheila,
You may log into your business center by going to www.mbopartners.com and clicking “login” at the type right corner of the page. From there you will enter your username which is mccoysk and then enter your password. If you do not recall your password you may click the “forgot your password” link and you will be sent a new password. Once you access the business center you may update your personal information in the system.
Please let me know if you have any additional questions.
Thank you and have a great weekend! Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
